headline: Lululemon Faces Fresh Shake-Up In Leadership
summary: Departure adds pressure as LULU consolidates regional operations

raw.headline: Lululemon Faces Fresh Shake-Up In Leadership
raw.summary: Departure adds pressure as LULU consolidates regional operations

headline: Celeste Burgoyne Exits Lululemon After 19 Years, Brand Reshuffles Top Management
summary: As Burgoyne exits the role of president of the Americas, the brand is consolidating regional leadership under André Maestrini.

raw.headline: Celeste Burgoyne Exits Lululemon After 19 Years, Brand Reshuffles Top Management
raw.summary: As Burgoyne exits the role of president of the Americas, the brand is consolidating regional leadership under André Maestrini.

headline: lululemon Announces Updates to Leadership Team
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, November 21, 2025--lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) today announced that Celeste Burgoyne, President of the Americas and Global Guest Innovation, has decided to leave the company for a new opportunity outside of the industry. She will remain with lululemon until the end of December 2025 to ensure a smooth transition.

raw.headline: lululemon Announces Updates to Leadership Team
raw.summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, November 21, 2025--lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) today announced that Celeste Burgoyne, President of the Americas and Global Guest Innovation, has decided to leave the company for a new opportunity outside of the industry. She will remain with lululemon until the end of December 2025 to ensure a smooth transition.

headline: Lululemon’s head of the Americas to exit
summary: Twenty-year veteran Celeste Burgoyne’s departure puts yet another wrench in the brand’s turnaround and represents the loss of a “key architect” of the brand’s success.
